name: AWS Comprehend
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Comprehend 节点。主要用于: Sends data to Amazon Comprehend

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: The resource to perform | 默认值: text

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: detectDominantLanguage
available_options: Detect Dominant Language (值: detectDominantLanguage) - Identify the dominant language
Detect Entities (值: detectEntities) - Inspects text for named entities, and returns information about them
Detect Sentiment (值: detectSentiment) - Analyse the sentiment of the text

languageCode.name: languageCode
languageCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language Code | 作用: The language code for text | 默认值: en

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text to send

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: endpointArn (值: None) - The Amazon Resource Name of an endpoint that is associated with a custom entity recognition model
